Translations.Text: mattu navu avaredege, avarolagindale, ‘‘allahanannu matra aradhisiri, nimage avana horatu bere devarilla. Nivenu anjuvudillave?‘‘ (Endu saruva) dutarannu kalisidevu

avara janangadallina, dhikkarigalagidda nayakaru, paralokada bhetiyannu sullendu tiraskarisiddaru. Mattu iha jivanadalli navu avarige bhari sampannateyannu nididdevu. (Avaru) helidaru; avanu kevala nim'mantaha obba manusya. Nivu tinnuvantahaddanne avanu tinnuttane mattu nivu kudiyuvantahaddanne avanu kudiyuttane
(higirutta) nivu nim'mantaha obba manavanannu anusarisidare khandita nasta anubhavisuviri
avanenu, nivu sattu mannagiyu elubugalagiyu marpatta balika nim'mannu matte jivantagolisalaguvudendu heluttiddaneye
nimage nidalaguttiruva i asvasane tira asambhavaniya
Nam'ma baduku eniddaru i lokaddu matra. Navu (ille) sayutteve mattu (ille) badukutteve. Nam'mannu matte jivantagolisalaguvudilla
i vyakti allahana mele sullaropa horisuttiddane. Navantu avanannu nambuvavaralla
avaru (dutaru) helidaru; nannodeya, nanage neravagu. Avaru nannannu tiraskarisuttiddare
avanu (allahanu) helidanu; bahala alpavadhiyalle avaru paritapisaliddare
konege n'yaya prakara ondu hathat sphotavu avarannu avarisikonditu. Mattu navu avarannu kevala kasagalagisibittevu. Akrami janangagalige vinasa kadide
munde, avara balika navu itara piligegalannu srstisidevu
yavude samudayavu tanna nirdista avadhiginta munce horatu hodaddu illa. A balika ulidaddu illa

taruvaya navu bennu bennige nam'ma dutarannu kalisidevu. Pratiyondu samudayadavaru tam'ma balige tam'ma dutanu bandaga atanannu tiraskarisidaru. Navu avarannu obbara hinde innobbarante nillisidevu mattu navu avarellarannu kevala kategalagi marpadisi bittevu. (Satyavannu) nambada janangagalige vinasa kadide
munde navu musa mattu avara sahodara harunarannu nam'ma vacanagalondige hagu spasta puravegalondige kalisidevu –
– phir‌aun mattu avana adhikarigala kadege. Adare avaru doddastike toridaru. Avaru maha ahankarigalagiddaru
